TextBody:
Hello Vikas,

I am following up in regards of your WhatsApp blocking excel files issue.

In order to block Excel files completely, please make sure of the following:

You have selected the two WhatsApp exit points from the Instant Messaging tab under Policy Exit Points:



Also, besides the predefined content, make sure you select the ''Excel'' file type from under the File Type section:



Do not forget to select the entities to apply this policy to and then update the policy locally on the machine and test again.

Let me know how it goes.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
